alert.note: Alert for Dunn; McKenzie; McLean; Mountrail (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 5:48PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN DUNN, NORTHWESTERN MCLEAN, NORTHEASTERN MCKENZIE AND CENTRAL MOUNTRAIL COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM CDT... At 547 PM CDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles southwest of Ross to 7 miles south of 4 Bears Lodge. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... 4 Bears Lodge around 550 PM CDT. Belden around 615 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include White Earth, Deep Water Creek Recreation Area, Skunk Creek Bay Recreation Area, Parshall Bay Recreation Area, White Earth Bay Recreation Area and Pouch Point Recreation Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If on or near Lake Sakakawea, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
